text: Carla Suzanne Denyer (born 1985) is a British politician who is a member of the Green Party of England and Wales. She has been a co-leader of the Green Party of England and Wales alongside Adrian Ramsay since 1 October 2021. She has been a city councillor in the English city of Bristol since 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Leaders of political parties in the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from Bristol Category:Green Party of England and Wales people
title: Carla Denyer
